title: Special Case Files of Rebirth - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Changes   Assassins   Average-looking Protagonist   Crime   Criminals   Dark   Death   Detectives   Doctors   Doting Love Interests   Eidetic Memory   Enemies Become Lovers   Friendship   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Identity Crisis   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Murders   Nurses   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Police   Possessive Characters   Quirky Characters   Reincarnation   Secret Identity   Secrets   Serial Killers   Shameless Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters   Smart Couple   Stoic Characters   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters
author: KuangXiang Zhi Tu   The Road Of Fantasy   狂想之途
description:
Hei Xiao, who was a famous assassin, could never have imagined that one day, he would be shot in the head. This was retribution. 

But he didn’t die. 

When he opened his eyes, two men and a woman were gathered around the bed and kindly told him that he had ‘amnesia’: “You are our good, beloved coworker.”

Hei Xiao asked, “What’s our job?”

They replied, “The police~”

Hei Xiao was speechless.

Looking at the strangely pale and thin face in the mirror in front of him, Hei Xiao wished he could die again: God, although I’ve sinned a lot, you don’t have to play me like this! >
